      Method returns name given for selected locale and id of the card.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the card in question.
      locale - Locale for the language in which we need the name.
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • switchType

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> switchType​(Type type, java.util.Locale locale)
      Method that returns array with color code and localized name of the color for building the card graphics.
      Parameters:
      type - Type that we want the color and localized name for.
      locale - Locale for wanted language of the type name.
      Returns:
      ArrayList with string of the color code and localized name of type of the card.

    • switchTypeForName

      Parameters:
      type - Type we want to translate to string in English.
      Returns:
      English name of the type.

    • switchTypeForName

      public static java.lang.String switchTypeForName​(Type type, java.util.Locale locale)
      Method returns localized name of the type.
      Parameters:
      type - Type we want to translate to language by Locale.
      locale - Locale for language we want the type translated to.
      Returns:
      Localized name of the type.

    • switchNameForType

      Returns:

    • switchCardNameForStringType
